name: shyster
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a dishonest person, especially a lawyer or politician: He's a real shyster. What are those shyster politicians doing now?
Add to word list
Add to word list
a dishonest person, esp. a lawyer
Add to word list
Add to word list
a dishonest person, especially a lawyer: He called Greene a shyster who lied, cheated, and overcharged for work he didn't do.
